biotools.summary: The FASTA programs find regions of local or global similarity between protein or DNA sequences, either by searching protein or DNA databases, or by identifying local duplications within a sequence. Like BLAST, FASTA can be used to infer functional and evolutionary relationships between sequences as well as help identify members of gene families.
